metadata.title: CVE-2022-2010 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds read in compositing in Google Chrome prior to 102.0.5005.115allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
